page.title: 16GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: I like playing indoors with my drawing things and with my brother and sister. I like races,skipping and relays where you have to run up to the top of the pavement and run down and tig the next person.I like to play{hide and seek where someone has to count and the others hide.You count up to 100 and when you find them they are on to count. When it is raining and I have to stay in I like to play with my toys and on my{computer,}listen to records or play with dolls or action men. I like all these kinds of{entertainment {and also}to play with my cats. I also play table tennis and snooker in the house when it is raining.Some games we play according to the seasons e.g. cricket in summer, "Conkers" in autumn, football in winter and snowballing if it snows and marbles in spring.
